worshipper noun [C]
(RELIGION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who goes to a religious ceremony to worship God: At 11 a.m. on Sunday morning, worshippers began to stream out of the cathedral.
someone who worships and performs religious ceremonies to a particular god or object: devil/idol worshippers
